name: Prettech Canada Inc.
address: Prettech Canada Inc., 5791 Prince Albert Street V5W 3E1, Vancouver, BC V6H 3X8

featured_reviews.review_id: Michael and the Prettech Canada team were fantastic partners when purchasing some equipment to start up our farm distillery in Ontario. Speaking as a very small scale player, I was amazed at how generous Michael was with his time in guiding me towards the right equipment solutions. The team was quick to respond, flexible with my needs, and overall enjoyable to work with. Looking forward to partnering with Prettech again in the future as we scale up our business.
featured_reviews.review_text: Michael and the Prettech Canada team were fantastic partners when purchasing some equipment to start up our farm distillery in Ontario. Speaking as a very small scale player, I was amazed at how generous Michael was with his time in guiding me towards the right equipment solutions. The team was quick to respond, flexible with my needs, and overall enjoyable to work with. Looking forward to partnering with Prettech again in the future as we scale up our business.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Congratulations up coming opening, I'm on standby if I can assist. Ryan, i appreciate the kind review.

featured_reviews.review_id: I have had the pleasure of working with Michael and Prettech Canada over the last year. Not only is the equipment exceptional but the service is fantastic as well. Michael does extensive work to ensure you have the right equipment for the job. Multiple times he has come to my facility, and gathered all the information I needed for my space. He is an invaluable asset to my company and would recommend him to anyone looking to get in the brewing or distillation space.
featured_reviews.review_text: I have had the pleasure of working with Michael and Prettech Canada over the last year. Not only is the equipment exceptional but the service is fantastic as well. Michael does extensive work to ensure you have the right equipment for the job. Multiple times he has come to my facility, and gathered all the information I needed for my space. He is an invaluable asset to my company and would recommend him to anyone looking to get in the brewing or distillation space.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Exceptional client, thank you for the kind review Peter. I'm looking forward to your continued success nice work!

featured_reviews.review_id: As the General Manager for Pure Spirits Inc, I have had the pleasure of dealing with Michael Chaplin of Prettech Canada since the summer of 2022. His company has provided exceptional support and direction in order to help us achieve our goals. We look forward to continuing our collaboration for years to come, and highly recommend his company and services!
featured_reviews.review_text: As the General Manager for Pure Spirits Inc, I have had the pleasure of dealing with Michael Chaplin of Prettech Canada since the summer of 2022. His company has provided exceptional support and direction in order to help us achieve our goals. We look forward to continuing our collaboration for years to come, and highly recommend his company and services!

featured_reviews.review_id: We hired Prettech Canada to design our custom stainless  ethanol holding tanks, as well as install a new production still at our distillery in Delhi, ON.  From the very start Michael was available for us almost around the clock any always had the answers to keep our project moving in the right direction.  The engineering team brought our vision to a reality.  We would highly recommend this company and will use them exclusively in all of our future distillery expansion projects.
featured_reviews.review_text: We hired Prettech Canada to design our custom stainless  ethanol holding tanks, as well as install a new production still at our distillery in Delhi, ON.  From the very start Michael was available for us almost around the clock any always had the answers to keep our project moving in the right direction.  The engineering team brought our vision to a reality.  We would highly recommend this company and will use them exclusively in all of our future distillery expansion projects.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Brilliant thank you for the nice words Joel. I've enjoyed working with you and your team. It's truly a pleasure working with a winning team of for thinkers. Nice work

featured_reviews.review_id: I've had the opportunity to work with Prettech Canada on brewhouse system engineering and quality assurance. Exceptional attention to detail, and some of the best welds i've seen around. The team was a pleasure to work with, friendly and personable. Spent some time with CEO Mike who goes out of his way to ensure customer success. Kudos!
featured_reviews.review_text: I've had the opportunity to work with Prettech Canada on brewhouse system engineering and quality assurance. Exceptional attention to detail, and some of the best welds i've seen around. The team was a pleasure to work with, friendly and personable. Spent some time with CEO Mike who goes out of his way to ensure customer success. Kudos!
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Jonathan, I've enjoyed working with you & look forward to some fun projects in the future.

featured_reviews.review_id: I purchased a small brewery system from Mike from Prettech Canada and so far have been satisfied by the craftmanship of the builds and impressed by the service from the company. Also the care of securing the products within the container, to make sure it arrives in perfect condition. Mike was easily accessible for getting information and pass it to me right away.  He goes above and beyond the scope of service for me.
featured_reviews.review_text: I purchased a small brewery system from Mike from Prettech Canada and so far have been satisfied by the craftmanship of the builds and impressed by the service from the company. Also the care of securing the products within the container, to make sure it arrives in perfect condition. Mike was easily accessible for getting information and pass it to me right away.  He goes above and beyond the scope of service for me.
featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the opportunity to earn your trust and business Clayton, it's truly been a pleasure. Please let me know if and when I can assit you and your team with anything. Looking forward to stopping over for a "Cold one". :)

featured_reviews.review_id:
We have the fortune to be located close to Prettech Canada and thus we have experienced the outstanding customer service long before the delivery of the equipment.
Michael has provided useful suggestions, recommendations, physical help and even tools to tackle and solve many of the challenges associated with the entire process and not only limited to the equipment delivery and installation.
Recently the equipment was delivered and we were highly impressed with the quality of the manufacturing and the attention to details. All this combined with competitive pricing make, in our opinion, Prettech Canada the number 1 choice in brewing equipment.

featured_reviews.review_id:
Had the pleasure of collaborating with Prettech Canada on a project. Their level of professionalism and pride in their craftsmanship and work is top-notch. You can be 100% sure you are in good hands with Prettech.
Look forward to working with them again in the future.

featured_reviews.response_from_owner_text:
Kris is the owner of  Attention to Detail and that's an understatement his craftsmanship is amazing he put a mere polish on some copper tanks that had them piping with brilliance. I can hardly wait to work with his team again!
If your looking for prompt service and a keen eye for detail Kris is your man!
